plot: Sylvester gets a rubber mouse for Christmas, but he much prefers Granny's gift: a new Tweety Bird.
title: Gift Wrapped
plot_es: Sylvester gets a rubber mouse for Christmas, but he much prefers Granny's gift: a new Tweety Bird.
plot_en: Sylvester gets a rubber mouse for Christmas, but he much prefers Granny's gift: a new Tweety Bird.
